explanation: The line 'ans=N+a-1' was wrong: when the remainder a is 4 this adds 3 (N+3) instead of rounding up to the next multiple of 5 (which requires adding 1). The correct amount to add is (5 - a). I replaced that single line with 'ans=N+5-a' so numbers with remainder 3 or 4 round up correctly.
